modName: Nordic Christmas Lanterns - Iceblue and Golden pattern Texture Replacer for MannyGT's Christmas Lanterns
summary: This pack replaces the textures of Christmas Lanterns mod by MannyGT. I made this little change because I really love this feature but I don't like overcolored things so much. (It's relative, I know) So it was necessary to make some solid and "lore-friendly" design for the lanterns with some Scandinavian pattern to make it more Skyr
descriptionHtml:
This pack replaces the textures of Christmas Lanterns mod by MannyGT.

Original Link:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27845/?

I made this little change because I really love this feature but I don't like overcolored things so much. (It's relative, I know) So it was necessary to make some solid and "lore-friendly" design for the lanterns with some Scandinavian pattern to make it more Skyrim-like and Christmas-like. I decided to make these color variations, because the iceblue one expressess clarity, however the golden one has a homelike warm mood. I hope you'll like it.:)
Cheers and Happy Holiday!

Installation:
Extract Files into your Skyrim Folder

CREDITS:
Original Christmas Lanterns Mod is made by the respectful MannyGT
author: Silverloom
